name: Color Fanatic Heat Protectant Leave-In Conditioner
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Leave-In Conditioner
about: What it is:u00a0A hydrating leave-in conditioner that primes, detangles, adds shine, preserves color vibrancy, and protects hair from heat damage up to 450u00b0F...Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture:Coily, Curly, Straight, and Wavy..Hair Concerns:.- Dryness.- Frizz.- Heat Protection..Key Benefits:.- Protects hair color and shields against heat up to 450u00b0 F.- Prevents hair breakage and split ends.- Easily detangles, smooths frizz, and adds shine..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Camelina Oil: Nurtues hair..- Coconut Oil: Moisturizes hair..- Olive Oil: Adds shine...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know:u00a0This multi-tasking formula hydrates dry hair, easily detangles, smooths frizz, primes before styling, adds shine, protects hair color and helps prevent breakage and split ends. Whether straight and fine or curly and thick, this leave-in works for all hair types...Clinical Results: In a consumer study after one week of using the Color Fanatic Leave-In Spray:..- 94% said hair detangles instantly.- 92% said hair looks smoother.- 89% said improves hair manageability
ingredients: -Camelina Oil: Nurtures hair..-Coconut Oil: Moisturizes hair..-Olive Oil: Adds shine...Aqua/Water/Eau, Cocos Nucifera Oil/Coconut Oil, Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-37, Ppg-5-Ceteth-10 Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Acetamide Mea, Sodium Hydroxide, Parfum/Fragrance, Lactamide Mea, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Ppg-1 Trideceth-6, Trideceth-6, Behentrimonium Chloride, Xylose, Ethylhexylglycerin, Helianthus Annuus Seed Extract/Sunflower Seed Extract, Linalool, Dimethiconol, Benzophenone-4, Isopropyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Tocopherol, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Olea Europaea Fruit Oil/Olive Fruit Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Citronellol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein Pg-Propyl Silanetriol, Isoeugenol, Bht, Sodium Chloride, Melanin, Potassium Sorbate, Pentylene Glycol, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Spray on clean, damp hair and comb through ends before styling....Pro Tips:.-For extra color protection, spray on dry hair before swimming or spending excessive time in the sun..-For fine hair, apply in the shower and detangle and rinse remaining product from the hair to remove unwanted weight..-For thick and curly hair, spray on dry hair to easily detangle before natural styling.
